title: Out of Africa (1985) Meryl Streep+Robert Redford (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files are included.
Additional subtitles (Nordic + English, Dutch, Hebrew, Hungarian) in this torrent: <a href="

 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089755/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089755/</a>

Karen Blixen's eternal love story from Kenya won 7 Oscars. Thank you, Denmark!
Only full DVDs remain here on PirateBay, so I made this rip for those of you who cannot download such dinosaurs. 

Meryl Streep developed her convincing Danish accent by listening to actual recordings of Karen Blixen reading her works.
More fun stuff at http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089755/trivia

DVDrip, widescreen, XviD 2-pass 704x384, great stereo sound, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

My new ripping procedure now gives decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB.
